name: Dot Game
description:
An old nostalgic game. 

Join dots to form lines.

Lines form squares and you get points.

Most points winner.

Online Global multiplayer with private rooms. 

Interactive Chat box, Talk in the room while waiting for someone. Talk while playing.

Show the world who is the best.

Source code is at https://github.com/Sahaj-Bamba/Dot-Game

Support me at https://www.buymeacoffee.com/7OnBUe

My profile page is http://sahajbamba.me

Download JRE 11 here: Java download
